actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-699.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4275) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain hydroelectric powerplants at various existing water projects, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4275 (hydroelectric projects).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4275) to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain hydroelectric powerplants at various existing water projects, and for other purposes.
